question: Corner points of the feasible region for an LPP are (0, 2), (3, 0), (6, 0), (6, 8) and (0, 5). Let <katex>$z=4x+6y$</katex> be the objective function. The minimum value of z occurs at
choices: The mid-point of the line segment joining the points (0, 2) and (3, 0)
Any point on the line segment joining the points (0, 2) and (3, 0)
explanation: Z value is 12 at both (0, 2) and (3, 0), which is the minimum.
